kbpage.title: Interesting Patches
kbpage.section:
Sometimes interesting patches are written but not applied by Alexandre. Maybe they're incomplete, maybe they're wrong, maybe they'd break other parts of the code or maybe they're blocked on some other piece of work that isn't done yet.
This page can be used to keep track of them, so we can remember to try and get them accepted in future.
* archive | local : EWMH Full screen support * archive | local : System tray patch
